query.q: findall([_Obj,_Time], (owl_individual_of(_Perception, knowrob:'UIMAPerception'), owl_has(_Perception, knowrob:'perceptionResult', _Obj), owl_has(_Perception, knowrob:'endTime', _Time)), _Objs), member([Obj,Time], _Objs), belief_at(loc(Obj,Loc), Time), add_object_as_semantic_instance(Obj, Loc, Time, Instance), add_object_with_children(Instance).

query.text: What was the collision strategy during the experiment?

query.q: action_designator('REPLACEABLE-FUNCTION-MOVE-OVER-OBJECT', Timepoint, Designator), mng_designator(Designator, _DesigJava), mng_designator_property(Designator, _DesigJava, ['ARM'], 'RIGHT'), mng_designator_property(Designator, _DesigJava, ['OBJECT', 'RESPONSE'], Object).
query.text: Over which objects did the robot moved the right arm?
----- Queries on the robot's logged belief state -----

query.q: owl_individual_of(_I, saphari:'HumanIntrusion'), owl_has(_I, knowrob:'startTime', T), owl_has(_I, knowrob:'designator', _D), mng_designator_props(_D, 'TF-PREFIX', _Prefix), intrusion_link(openni_human:'iai_human_robot1', _Prefix, T, BodyPart).
query.text: Which body parts of the human intersected the safety area at first?

query.q: owl_individual_of(I, saphari:'HumanIntrusion'), owl_has(I, knowrob:'startTime', T), saphari_visualize_agents(T).
query.text: What was the pose of agents when intrusion events occurred?
